name: Fetch (itch) (YelloeJ)
description:
-A simple throwing game is a made for the Weekly Game Jam, and the theme was, 'hurl'.

-The main goal is just to throw to ball as far as you can and have fun.

-Feedback is greatly appreciated!

Controls

-Simply throw the ball really hard with your mouse/finger.

-Fullscreen is recommended.

-If you encountered a bug, press 'r' to reset the scene.
